title: Same Parents
question: Do you have the same parents as {deceasedName}?
paragraph1: This includes if you were legally adopted by one or both of {deceasedName}'s parents.
optionBothParentsSame: Both of my parents are the same
optionOneParentsSame: One of my parents is the same
optionNoParentsSame: I have different parents or one of {deceasedName}'s parents is my step-parent

sameParents.required: Select whether you have the same parents as {deceasedName}
